APIs, Products, and API Products

Outline (APIs, Products, and API Products)

  1. APIs, Products, and API Products [3]
  2. API Product Management [5]
  3. Conclusions [2]
APIs, Products, and API Products Erik Wilde (@dret): API Design: From Projects to Products

(3) What is an API?

  • An API is a digitally accessible capability
  • An API is designed with users and reuse in mind
  • An API creates value when it is consumed by users


APIs, Products, and API Products Erik Wilde (@dret): API Design: From Projects to Products

(4) What is a Product?



APIs, Products, and API Products Erik Wilde (@dret): API Design: From Projects to Products

(5) What is a Good API? Useful ≫ Findable ≫ Usable

  1. Useful means that it addresses customers' Jobs to Be Done [https://hbr.org/2016/09/know-your-customers-jobs-to-be-done]
  2. Findable means that potential consumers have a fighting chance of finding it
  3. Usable means that the product makes it easy to get their jobs done


API Product Management

API Product Management Erik Wilde (@dret): API Design: From Projects to Products

(7) Business APIs

  • APIs representing well-defined business capabilities
  • APIs designed and developed as digital building blocks
  • The API platform is about digital business and not about IT management


API Product Management Erik Wilde (@dret): API Design: From Projects to Products

Conclusions Erik Wilde (@dret): API Design: From Projects to Products

(13) There's no API Magic

  • API value is a question of re-imagining your business
  • Think about digital building blocks and APIs will follow
  • Outside-in beats inside-out every single time


Conclusions Erik Wilde (@dret): API Design: From Projects to Products
